title.title: BALI WATER SPORTS AND SWING TOUR
title.text: BALI WATER SPORTS AND SWING TOUR
title.html: BALI WATER SPORTS AND SWING TOUR

tagline.title: BALI WATER SPORTS AND SWING TOUR IS DOUBLE ACTIVITY FOR ENJOY THE FUN OF WATER SPORTS ACTIVITY AND THEN DO JUNGLE SWING AT BALI SWING
tagline.text: BALI WATER SPORTS AND SWING TOUR IS DOUBLE ACTIVITY FOR ENJOY THE FUN OF WATER SPORTS ACTIVITY AND THEN DO JUNGLE SWING AT BALI SWING
tagline.html: BALI WATER SPORTS AND SWING TOUR IS DOUBLE ACTIVITY FOR ENJOY THE FUN OF WATER SPORTS ACTIVITY AND THEN DO JUNGLE SWING AT BALI SWING

description.text: Bali Water Sports and Swing Tour is Bali Double Activities Tour packages for enjoy the fun of water sports activity at tanjung benoa beach with selection of water sports activity in this package and then continue do jungle swing at Bali swing company, is perfect choice for those want to do water sports and jungle swing in one day with affordable price and good service. the first adventure begins by doing water sports activities on Tanjung Benoa beach with the activity options contained in this package, such as banana boat, flying fish, glass bottom boat and turtle islands tour, combining a suitable water sports package to enjoy the thrill of water play on the island Bali, after we finish water sports, we will head to Bali Swing, arriving in Bali swing we will having buffet lunch, after lunch we will do a jungle swing with such beautiful scenery, and also you can take photos at bird nest with the background natural scenery, and take photos on some spots on Bali Swing. Our very interesting experience is presented to you in a combination of water activity and jungle swing. After doing the activity on Bali Swing, our driver will take you back to the hotel with an impressive experience in the Bali Water Sports and Swing Tour

Is great opportunity we offer to you for try our selection water sports activity in this packages. The Water Sports Tour you will enjoy such as : Banana Boat, Flying Fish, Glass Bottom Boat and Turtle Islands Tour. The professional water sports instructor will give the best services to make your water sports activity more enjoyable. Is impressive experience you will have during your holiday in Bali by doing this water sports tour packages.

title.title: Bali Swing Tour | Bali Water Sports and Swing Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Swing Tour | Bali Water Sports and Swing Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Swing Tour is an adventure activity that we created for those of you who want to enjoy swings on the island of Bali with very beautiful scenery in the forest, really the sensation of a tour that is different from the others. Swing in Bali is an activity that has just been introduced, but because of the enthusiasm of the tourists who want to try this activity making swing activities famous among domestic and foreign tourists. The activity is located in the village of Bongkasa, close to Ubud. And this swing attraction can be combined with several tours to visit tourism objects in Bali.
description.html: Bali Swing Tour is an adventure activity that we created for those of you who want to enjoy swings on the island of Bali with very beautiful scenery in the forest, really the sensation of a tour that is different from the others. button.title: Bali Swing Tour | Bali Water Sports and Swing Tour Packages

price.title: Bali Water Sports and Swing Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Water Sports and Swing Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,575,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,075,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 875,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 785,000/person
  • 5 Person or More: IDR 735,000/person

Note :

  • Get special price for group booking

Bali Water Sports and Swing Tour Price Included :

  • Private Car with Clean, Comfortable and Good A/C condition
  • English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • Mineral Water
  • Safety and Well Maintenance Equipment's
  • Bali Water Sports Tour Packages :
    1. Flying Fish (2 Fly)
    2. Banana Boat (15 Minutes)
    3. Glass Bottom Boat and Turtle Islands (60 Minutes)
  • Jungle Swing at Bali Swing
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Insurance Coverage

itinerary.title: Bali Water Sports and Swing Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Water Sports Finish and go to Bali Swing
Arrive at Swing and Enjoy Lunch

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.
